column4: Could someone help me, I have installed grub, and now my hard drive is corrupted
grub does not seem to boot correctly anymore, the windows xp cd does not recognised the computer, the windows vista cd boots but can not repair the drive
ljl: I can boot linux just fine, it's located in the second partition and I use a flash disk with grub installed
if you have windows on your system then you could try fixmbr, google for that on the microsoft site
